hello with Chef John from food wishes
calm with some amazing lamb chops these

they are I got two packages those are
one pound packages of loin lamb chops
they're kind of like a t-bone of lamb
you got the little tenderloin there and
then the loin on the other side so I got
10 of those those are from Australia
sorry local boars but you know I'm
usually mr. local but these were just
too good to pass up great price and I'm
assuming they raised them very ethically
I'm gonna throw in a big spoon of garlic

gonna around the Mediterranean some

maybe it's North African and a little

and then we're gonna let it marinate at
least four hours you can go overnight so

nice hot grill
all right so I'm going to salt the other

what I'd like to do is turn them up on

that part will be the most rare so a
minute or two on that end just kind of

all right attest that with my finger yes
it was really hot but it felt

loosely covered with the foil just kind

delicious
a couple spoons of orange marmalade a

a big pinch of fresh chopped mint so
this is kind of like a gourmet mint

but what I like to do is thin it out

wine vinegar very mild vinegar it's got

this is such a beautiful sauce it's it's
